name: BetterRoblox 2.1 [New blog support; random fixes]
description: An overhaul of my 2.0 theme allowing users to customize an accent color, providing a more personalized Roblox theme. Enjoy! You can contact me on Twitter (@EpikYummeh) directly or send me a message on Roblox. Please leave me feedback here. It helps me know what you want so I can make my theme better, so please leave descriptive feedback. Avoid feedback like "the games page is broken," instead say something like "I can't read the text on the games page" or "I can't click the scroll button on the games page."

user.name: EpikYummeh
user.about: Software developer and avid music listener with a love for dark website styles. Check out some of my work!

additional_info: Tags: dark obc roblox theme style skin outrageous builders club grayscale
